results.name: Stripe Press Books
results.description:
Stripe partners with millions of the world’s most innovative businesses. These businesses are the result of many different inputs. Perhaps the most important ingredient is “ideas.”

Stripe Press highlights ideas that we think can be broadly useful. Some books contain entirely new material, some are collections of existing work reimagined, and others are republications of previous works that have remained relevant over time or have renewed relevance today.

books.title: Scientific Freedom: The Elixir of Civilization
The Making of Prince of Persia
The Revolt of The Public and the Crisis of Authority in the New Millennium
Art of Doing Science and Engineering
An Elegant Puzzle: Systems of Engineering Management
Poor Charlie's Almanack: The Wit and Wisdom of Charles T. Munger

results.name: NPRs Top 100 Science-Fiction and Fantasy Books of All Time
results.description: In 2011, NPR set out to make a list of what their listeners believed to be the best science fiction and fantasy books ever written. More than 5,000 people nominated books, then over 60,000 people voted on the best ones. This list is highlights the most popular books voted by NPR readers across these two genres.

books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

results.name: Top 25 Books to Unleash Your Creative Potential
results.description: Creativity can flourish if fed by curiosity, self-motivation, and a thirst for knowledge. Below is a treasure trove of brilliant books for creatives as gathered by Lifehack's Tayyab Babar.

books.title: Drawing on the right side of the brain workbook
Steal Like an Artist: 10 Things Nobody Told You About Being Creative
The Checklist Manifesto: How to Get Things Right

results.name: The 100 Best Fantasy Books of All Time by Time Magazine
results.description: Time Magazine called upon top fantasy authors (e.g., N.K. Jemisin, Neil Gaiman, Sabaa Tahir, Tomi Edeyemi, Diana Gabaldon, George R.R. Martin, Cassandra Clare, and Marlon James) to collect the most influential works of fantasy fiction in chronological order starting in the 9th century A.D.

books.title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland and Other Tales
The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe: A Graphic Novel
Roald Dahl James and the Giant Peach: The Book and Movie Scrapbook

results.name: Npr Top 100 Science Fiction Fantasy
results.description: This list was created by NPR.

books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

results.name: The New York Times's 50 Best Memoirs of the Past 50 Years
results.description: The New York Times' Book critics far and wide have selected the top best memoirs published since 1969.

books.title: All God's Dangers: The Life of Nate Shaw
Clothes, Clothes, Clothes. Music, Music, Music. Boys, Boys, Boys
Kafka Was the Rage: A Greenwich Village Memoir

results.name: The 31 Best Fantasy Books Everyone Should Read
results.description: WIRED's team has summoned some of the strangest creatures in the most fantastic worlds in this list of the best fantasy books everyone should read.

books.title: Black Leopard, Red Wolf (The Dark Star Trilogy #1)
A Court of Thorns and Roses

results.name: Top 20 Ennui-Filled Magical Realism Reads
results.description: These stories take place in worlds similar to ours with magical elements that blue the lines between fantasy and reality. Their characters must first conquer their own demons before they can conquer any others.

books.title: How to Live Safely in a Science Fictional Universe
The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
The Southern Book Club's Guide to Slaying Vampires

results.name: Pulitzer Prize-winning Fiction
results.description: This list contains Pulitzer Prize-winning fiction since the Fiction Prize's inception in 1948. The Pulitzer Prizes and Fellowships were established in Columbia University by Joseph Pulitzer. Prizes are awarded by the University on the recommendation of The Pulitzer Prize Board and are announced in Spring. Nominees are organized into 22 categories across journalism, books, drama and music.

books.title: The Collected Stories of Jean Stafford
A Good Scent from a Strange Mountain
The Mambo Kings Play Songs Of Love

results.name: The 70 Best Science Books You Need to Read in 2021
results.description: Well-researched, peer-reviewed discoveries fuel both Science and Science Fiction as this list rounds up the best science books you need to read in 2021.

books.title: The Science of Can and Can't
Foodology: A food-lover's guide to digestive health and happiness
Be Who You Want : Unlocking the Science of Personality Change
The Motherhood Complex: The story of our changing selves
Shape: The Hidden Geometry of Absolutely Everything
Graphic Science - Seven Journeys of Discovery
Inferior: How Science Got Women Wrong—and the New Research That's Rewriting the Story

results.name: Ten Best Non-Fiction Science Books to Read Right Now
results.description: From Einstein's quantum theory to human evolution and beyond—this list includes science books that tap into a universe of knowledge as collected by New Scientist's Simon Ings.

books.title: Einstein's Unfinished Revolution: The Search for What Lies Beyond the Quantum
How to Tame a Fox (and Build a Dog)
The Story of the Dinosaurs in 25 Discoveries: Amazing Fossils and the People Who Found Them

results.name: NPR Book Concierge's 29 Best Historical Fiction of 2020
results.description: National Public Radio's 29 best historical fiction books of 2020 as aggregated by Rose Friedman, Petra Mayer, Beth Novey, and Meghan Sullivan with Executive Producer Ellen Silva.

books.title: At Night All Blood is Black
The Care and Feeding of Waspish Widows
How Much of These Hills Is Gold
Mary and the Trail of Tears: A Cherokee Removal Survival Story

results.name: Pulitzer Prize-winning Novels
results.description: This list contains Pulitzer Prize-winning fiction from 1918 to 1947. The Pulitzer Prizes and Fellowships were established in Columbia University by Joseph Pulitzer. Prizes are awarded by the University on the recommendation of The Pulitzer Prize Board and are announced in Spring. Nominees are organized into 22 categories across journalism, books, drama and music.

books.title: Early Autumn: A Story of a Lady

results.name: The Best Travel Books of All Time by Condé Nast
results.description: Authors including Pico Iyer, Julia Phillips, and Imbolo Mbue et al gathered their favorite travel reads that will inspire, inform, and explore. Books included on this list—some old, some new—may have changed the way cultures, places, or people were considered in the past and may be considered in the future.

books.title: The Emperor: Downfall of an Autocrat
